comments:
- Start BIRT 2.1 after fresh install based on birt-report-designer-all-in-one-2.1RC3.zip.
- Close "Welcome" view.
- Open Perspective > Report Design

Result: Message Box: "An error has occured when activating this view."

- "OK" message box. The views "Property Editor" and "Problems" are open, "Property Editor" is active. 
- Click on "Problems Tab" to activate.
- Click on "Property Editor" to activate.

Result: Message Box: "An error has occured when activating this view."

- Open "Error Log" view. Double click on latest entry.

Message:
Problems occurred when invoking code from plug-in: "org.eclipse.ui.workbench".
